reviewText: Nice one. It requires experience in the art.

The receiver of this DVD (a gift) currently attends a martial arts school and said: "This is perfect! So many brilliant and really useful techniques and easy instruction - as well as inspiring teaching."
Great for anyone who wants to be the best at bjj
Great addition to the first set of DVDS! Goes over a lot of the basics that many people neglect nowadays. Nothing fancy, just pure Jiu Jitsu that stresses concepts and movement over just techniques.
Really worth buying the whole DVD set! Really improved my fight skills! Demian Maia is indeed the best Jiu-Jitsu fighter there is!
Awesome set!!!  One of the best BJJ DVD Sets out on the market,not just techniques,but more importantly,Concepts! Get this set!

There are many great BJJ fighters and teachers with DVD's on the market. Demian Maia is among the best. Demian covers details many do not and does a wonderful job and providing different looks and the reason you do certain things.  Great as a reference and to go back and clean up your technique. There are only a few techniques here and there that I didn't already know, but Demian reviews those little things so well there is still much to learn from all of the material.
